content.detailedDescription: very bright light stayed in one spot move  slightly moved to the left and then to the rights for over 30 minutes and then then it was gone....
content.summary: one spot move and slightly to the left and then to the rights for over 30 minutes and then just went out gone...

content.detailedDescription: This sighting was the second one my family and i had, and was much more intense than the first. it was almost dark if i remember correctly in may of 1986 when i noticed their were about 8-12 crafts of some kind scattered all around our house. their were a couple as close as a few hundred yards, and their were some that looked to be a mile or so away. my mom and i were on our back deck looking out at our lake we owned along with four or five other families that lived on it when i saw a huge triangular (it honestly looked like something out of star trek...It had a long nose about 15' wide and about 30-40' long and behind that it looked like a huge triangle. it had at least 8-10 different lights on it, and several different colors. it came right over our house, about 75' in the air (we had about 10 big trees in our back yard and it was about 25' over them i'd say) and it looked to be going about 10 miles per hour...Very slow. it stayed going the same direction toward the center of our lake which was about an 8 acre lake and stopped right over the center of it hovering for about 2-3 minutes. then, it slowly started moving again at the same speed, and the odd thing was it took the exact path it came in on but never turned around...It was like they put it in reverse and took the exact same route out of there as they did coming in. we watched it until it was out of sight, which was probably 10 minutes or more as slow as it was going. that's about everything from that particular incident.
content.summary: Huge triangular craft about 50' high came slowly over house then hovered over lake.

content.detailedDescription: I was with my husband and four house guests, standing on the west facing lanai which is at a second story level.  i live on a bridge less barrier island on the bay with the beach about a quarter mile to the west.  my property runs from bay to beach with no buildings between my home and the beach.  it was very dark out and around 1am.  suddenly we all see a bright, glowing oval object cruising in a straight line from left to right, going north at a moderate speed.  it was level with our elevation, directly out from us, and seemed to be around 100 yards or so away.  it's very difficult to guess it's size, but i would guess around 20 feet long and 10 feet high.  it could have been larger or smaller than that.  it could have been 10 feet long and five feet high.  i'm not sure.  it could also have been nearer or farther than 100 yards, but it was definitely over my property and fairly close.  we had time to discuss it, saying "do you see that?  what the heck is that?"  all six of us saw it.  three men and three women, all of us in our fifties.  then as it was nearing the northern side it suddenly disappeared.  blinked out.  i thought i saw a couple of flickers before it blinked out, but none of the others saw any flickering.  it was completely silent.  it never made a sound.  we were all awed by it.  i felt a little fear because my husband has always kidded me about being an alien because several years ago he woke up and said i sat up in bed and said "oh no, not again" and then proceeded to make bizarre sounds that reminded him of a computer transmission.  blips and beeps.  weird stuff.  i have no memory of it, but a couple days later i woke up with long bruises on my right cheek.  i took a picture of it at the time, but would have to look hard to find it.  i'm not saying i have ever had encounters and i sure hope i never have.  no memories whatsoever of anything like that.  just one very weird and vivid dream where a huge ufo was disguised as a cloud when it suddenly whooshed down to me.  it was just a dream, but i do remember it very vividly.  i'm hoping to get the other five who saw this object to also report it, or at least write down their recollection on the event.
content.summary: Bright orange glowing long oval object traveling north steady speed then blinked out

content.detailedDescription: dark night at 10 pm me and my friend went outside to go stargazing and we saw a glowing orb the shape of an egg moving rapidly and as me and my friend both loved learning and researching about aliens we tried to use morse code with our flashlights and as we asked for them to move on our commands with morris code it listened so let's say we said  right with morse code it did after the whole incident we went back inside to talk about it. then we went back outside and it was gone
content.summary: Bright orb that was moving rapidly

content.detailedDescription:
Outside smoking at dusk.  noticed right a way a bright light beaming in the sky,  just above plane flying level.  i even observed planes flying a distance below it.  it was definitely in our atmosphere.  in the far distance, a red/orange object was observed as well.  the red object hovered way out in the distance, directly about the bright light.  it looked to beyond our atmosphere, up in the stars.  perhaps, it was watching the bright white light.

the bright light did move, seemed to be moving forward.  as i continued to watch, it stopped suddenly and hovered.  i watched for almost an hour, both lights did not move.  i went inside for about 30 minutes and looked back outside but could not see anything due to cloud coverage.  i only observed the bright full moon.
content.summary: Observed a bright light in the sky that was moving closer in the distance, just above flight level (i live in o'hare landing line up path).  this was not a plane!It stopped/hovered for over an hr, above it hovered a red light further away in space.

content.detailedDescription: I went on a russian airplane flight from moscow to athens and sat in window seat with my mother next to me. 30 minutes before landing in greece i see strange looking land formations. looks like mountains have been cut smooth like sword. crop looking circle formations. land looks beautiful but land being messed with like i have never seen. 5-10 minutes later i see a long thin like stick that is thin, and so long change directions when plane flies by. my mom also saw this and has never believed in ufos. a minute or so later it looked like it was coming towards the plane. i was scared and my mother also but i tried to emit positive thoughts of we are ok and it won't hurt us. it stared to move into area airplane has passed and hovered over gigantic looking mountains that peaked far above the clouds for a minute or so and then i lost view. mountains made me think of mount olympus. very scary, divine not sure, but we got to athens safely.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: From moscow flight to athens i saw it 20-30 minutes before landing. saw it come towards plane. i think positive thoughts it goes away and hover over high mountains that peak high above clouds

content.detailedDescription: Eating lunch inside building and saw a dark object flying slowly over building across from mine. as it counted in the path it got higher. continued in the path until in went into the fog. at first looked like a guy wearing a jetpack then as it "turned" the object shaped changed. was witnessed by 6 people
content.summary: Dark object flying over

content.detailedDescription: Lights
content.summary: I seen these  lights with my family  it was green then changed to red.

content.detailedDescription: Youtuber ufodonamerica does it again with a small ufo fleet over florida. actual speed, full video on youtube. get night vision and see for yourself.
content.summary: Ufo / uap fleet over florida

content.detailedDescription:
Noticed first time around june of 2015. noticed a twinkling light but too colorful to be a start and appeared to rotate colors. do not have high powered lense on camera, so could not capture. i grabbed my binoculars and zeroed in on it.
initially it was hovering about 5 miles out, in the area of dog island and st. george sound. it disappeared and reappeared a couple times, then a beam of light hit our beach, it was like the shine of the moon, except the moon was not out. the beam started about 100 ft in the water and stopped at the parh going to the wated, my heart skipped. the object then disappeared  and reappeared moments later, quite a distance west, then seemed to elevate out of site.

this was also witnessed by my significant other.

i have seen the same object reappear twice since that night, most recently last night 1-12-16, at around 11:00 pm.
always appears from our living room window and .Oves west, eventually.
content.summary: Have seen three times. always hovers and lights rotate for a couple hours then quickly moves west and hovers again. lights orbiting object and take turns being dominate color

content.detailedDescription: Me and 2 friends were hanging out at swan lake park on new years 2017 walking around the lake and hanging out on some of the benches. 2 glowing pulsating amber orbs were hovering over the lake in the distance high up as if they were watching everyone on new years. these were not fireworks the fireworks were long over. there not chinese laterns these things moved slightly side to side and and up and down. i live on my sailboat near the airport with a government helicopter base nearby. im very well versed in aircraft lighting and this was nothing i have ever seen before and was not a plane or flare. it was both and exciting and spooky feeling like i am glad im seeing this but i sure hope it does not decide to get closer and possibly pick us up. for approx 5 to 10 min the 2 orbs hung around and acted as if they were playing with each other. both objects left as if they faded out or for lack of a better term warped or teleported out of there. they left at a speed not visable to my eye. i honestly could not tell you for sure what these 2 orbs were but i highly doubt they were anything human or any type of secret craft.
content.summary: 2 amber orbs hovering over swan lake in victoria bc on new years 2017

content.detailedDescription:
I live in a small town about 10 miles north of san francisco.

it was a bright sunny morning and i was at home.  i had opened the door to let my cat out on the deck like i do every morning.  he ran out and stopped on a dime, looked up at the sky, then ran back into the house with his ears flat back.  i stepped out onto the deck to see what had scared him.

i looked up and saw a round object in the sky to the north.  i immediately knew it was a ufo because i've seen three others prior to this.  it was about the size of a small pea in the sky, and was fairly close, i'd say about 400-500 feet high and about 1000-1500 feet in the distance.

it was spherical in shape, very light gray in color with whitish fuzzy edges.  the surface was dull, not shiny, and i noticed it appeared to be reflecting sunlight.  there were no distinguishing features - no portals, lights, colors or sound.

when i first saw the ufo it was moving northwest very slowly in a zigzag path, but then it abruptly turned and came directly towards me.  it got close enough to be about the size of an aspirin when it stopped and hovered in the air for about 8-10 seconds.  i got the impression it was checking me out.  as i watched it it morphed into a square with rounded corners then back to a sphere again.  this happened 3-4 times.  the grey color and white edges remained the same.

it began to slowly move away from me, resuming its zigzag path to the northwest.  i got the feeling it was looking for something.  suddenly it just disappeared, just winked out.  the entire sighting lasted 40-45 seconds.

this was a strange encounter.  when i first saw this ufo i felt dread - i don't know why.  then when it came directly towards me i was paralyzed by fear.  when it stopped and hovered i wondered if it was trying to communicate with me.  once it began moving away from me i suddenly realized that i was calm and unafraid, as if i hadn't just experienced something extraordinary.  as for my cat, he was scared and jumpy for about a week after this incident.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw a dull grey ufo reflecting morning sunlight, then it came directly towards me before moving to the northwest and disappearing.
I have reported this before

content.detailedDescription: Siting on my roofed back porch,facing north this evening at 6pm,i saw a faint red light and within a two seconds it was very very close and low and it stopped no sound and it had a white light glowing in center with red blinking lights in a pattern.I don't live far from interstate i:30,800 yards.It actually looked as it was hovering over the street in front of me(house between me and that street)it's exact shape is hard to give precise size,it was large because it blacked out a lot of sky,shape hard to say there were some tree limbs between us but in 30 seconds it shot off east faster than iv ever see anything and it made an abrupt stop,and at my view looked as it stopped around the intersection of military rd. and east st.And our two city water towers and then i could see a white beam of light pointing down. i also could be see and the red ones.Then it shot off east until out of site.This all happen within about 1 minute.
content.summary: Red blinking light ,with white light center beem when hovering

content.detailedDescription: A friend told me that he witnessed orange orbs so i decided to keep a watch on the sky. around 6:20-30 pm orange orbs started appearing, i was a bit scared so ran back inside my home.
content.summary: Orange orbs seen over mountains

content.detailedDescription: I was out side feeding my dogs and i herd a loud humming noise i looked to my right and there was a air craft like i've never seen before it was shaped like a triangle with three bright lights but had no color i got a video of it and then it was like it just disappeared it was weird
content.summary: Loud three lights but no color lights pretty big

content.detailedDescription:
The early morning on december 14 last year i was on my jmob parking spot and  that day we have  a very good full moon though  i thought to get an snap though when i see the picture  appear and object  at the left of the screen , right at the moment i thought was my lenses  dirty  after blown air on the lens i shot the second snap it may be 8 second after and the lighted object appear at  the right button of the picture the sky where clear and no other light where around to confuses , though am curious , it was a ufo  sight or what ?
last time see the object was close to the building
content.summary: At naked eyes a t glance  clear sky second after on the picture  show and objesct

content.detailedDescription: I bought a polaroid camera ,2 packs of film and went out at time and date ,took photos of moving light in sky then set developing prints inside house 10 feet away, 5 min later looked at developed pics.2 of the prints had a finger print. put together two of the pics and a full finger 7 inches long was there.The knuckles in pic had cracked and burnt the pics.Just a odd light which led me to take pics. its the finger prints which i need checked out, not the object
content.summary: Took polaroids let develope looked at after developing finger prints were on two photos

content.detailedDescription: Around 9:45 on tues jan 11th my neighbor and i were taking pictures of a beautiful full moon from our yard which is approximately a quarter mile from the atlantic ocean when we noticed a light  that was visible with our cameras but not to the naked eye. the light had a cylindrical shape and was moving in ways that i've only seen  humming birds move. after taking a few pictures and observing this object for about 5 or 6 minutes it disappeared with any sound what so ever. having lived 15 mins south of patrick air force base i have seen many planes,helicopters etc. in the sky but nothing that moved in this manner as well as not making any sound.
content.summary: Taking pictures of a full moon we noticed an object moving in a manner that defies conventional logic.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside, talking to a neighbor, when i saw this orb start flying around. it disappeared then when it reappeared, it came back with 15 more. it swirled above us for a few seconds then disappeared. this is not the first time that i've seen ufos and this is the second time that i've summoned them. thanks to robert bingham's video, i know how to do it. the first time i did it, i saw the orbs but then they morphed into a bird like creature with white bodies and black tipped wings but continued to glow. they swirled above me and my neighbor, flew into a formation and then disappeared. i googled a description into google search (orbs that shape shift into a bird like creature)and found a few pictures and a video that looked exactly like what i saw. one word to describe this is....Awesome!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glowing/hovering orbd

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of tuesday, january 10, 2017, at around 18:47:00 cst i was recording time lapse (night lapse) footage on my gopro hero5 black camera of the moon and the surrounding cloud cover looking towards ne pensacola florida i was using a short exposure and capturing at 3 fps. the event happened in less than one minute. while editing the footage i noticed two long cylindrical objects close to the center of the screen, one and then the other as if one was chasing the other. at first, i thought these to be meteors, but based on the reflection and shadows it appears that the objects enter the frame and exit in a distinct arch. when i zoom in on the second object and frame that shows the object permanently i see a clearly defined cylindrical object. i then realized that i may have captured something incredible and unidentified. i lost sight of the objects when they exited the frame after having momentarily entered the frame.
content.summary: Long cylindrical shaped objects spotted over pensacola florida

content.detailedDescription: I usually get up to go to work, so i decided to go outside to smoke a cigarette, then i notice a flash of light real bright then as i look up to see what it was , then that's when i freak out a little i notice that this two objects were chasing each other , but then one lead the other to follow , as i saw this i took a picture with my phone and ran inside to tell my wife what i just saw, she do not bieve, but i know two things, i k is what a plane and a helicopter looks like. but this thing didn't have no sound at all...Please make understand.
content.summary: I got a photo, when i got up to smoke a cigarette outside..

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping and i woke up to a low humming sound that sounded as if it was coming from everywhere, i then saw what appeared to be a low flying apache or black hawk helicopter, it slowly flew by after words the humming got intense, i then saw what appeared to be a  disk like object in the sky that pulsated and had red white and orange lights on it that were also soflty pulsating i looked at my clock when i woke up and it said that twenty five or so minutes have passed but it felt like it was no more than two or three i really hope that doesnt mean what i think it does, i tried to dismiss it as me being tired but i fear that i have had time loss, after what seemed like a minute the saucer shoot away then changed directions very abruptly, after words another or the same black helicopter came through the direction the ufo was going to fly until it changed direction, i just want answers to what this was, i want rationality.
content.summary: The ufo was large about 85 feet to 150 it was hard to tell it had a mix of orange white and red lights

content.detailedDescription: It was a clear day, no clouds no planes not even any birds. i was walking through the town and when i looked up i noticed roughly eleven silver cylinders gliding across the sky. they wernt making a sound just slowly making their way across the sky. they were cylinder shaped and they were silver, they glistened from the sun. they were closer than planes and had no details on them just plain cylinder shape. they also left a white smoke trail behind them as they moved. three of them went one way and four of them went the other way they seemed to pass each other as if they were in formation.
content.summary: 3 seemed to go one way 4 seemed to go the other they all passed each other

content.detailedDescription: I was playing inside a ditch on the edge of the woods. while inside the ditch there is a ledge and my chest was facing the inner wall of the ditch and i could see my back yard ground level. stepping sideways along the ledge i suddenly but "slowly" became paralyzed. i couldn't move my eyes or body and had the ability to keep standing upright. seconds after a needle in which i could feel and hear it digging into my face. the whole time this was happing i was trying to move. after a minute,i was able to regain my movement to jerk my head away from the needle. after that i felt my face and there was no blood or pain. i didn't look behind me or around. i simply got out of the ditch and walked back home. i didn't know about aliens in 1987 and so i was confused to what just happened to me. there are also other peoples stories about the woods, i learned many years later about an alien that wondered around in the woods. my brother told me years later about his story of seeing an alien standing behind a tree near the ditch as he was walking closer to the ditch and was able to run away. my mom was warned about something in the woods when we moved into the new house and was told not to go into the woods. since then my memory of the event left me to wonder what happened to me. now its 2017 and i'm hearing microwave frequency in my new area for about a year and nobody else can hear the frequency but me. its very organized and must be advanced military technology microwave auditory. i'm thinking that the needle procedure was an alien implant. i believe that the alien implant is able to pick up microwave frequency from the military by "accident" just like an antenna. this had led me to think that i truly have an alien implant deep in my face just under the cheek bone.      i would like to be interviewed.
content.summary: Something stuck a needle deep in my face under cheek bone

content.detailedDescription: I was walking out of my house looking at orion's belt, the stars are bright, and to my left (south east), i see what i think at first is a shooting star(moving south-west). i keep my eyes on it and notice it fade. a second or so later i see the light on the same path illuminate, turn sharply and shoot off slightly tilted up in trajectory (towards the south east), dimming as it increased speed [away]. i was so impressed that i laughed out loud and jumped around a little in my drive-way. it was one of the coolest things i have witnessed, if not the coolest.
content.summary: Shooting-star-like light moving turns 90 degrees and shoots into space

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of scenery at a park hill near the kern county aqueducts. later when i viewed the pictures i could see that a white object was in the photo over a field about a half mile out. this was in june 2016 i later returned to the same spot in november 2016 and took another picture in the same exact area. and the object is not in the distance. i have the pictures on my phone. time was around 4 pm . the object was white and was a kind of a flat bottom but had a dome shape or egg shaped . it casted a shadow under its bottom surface.
content.summary: Object floating over field in a photo that i took went back to same area object is not in distance

content.detailedDescription: My friends and i were fishing. i saw 3 weird disc like objects moving in various directions. i thought it was helicopters until it started moving in like a triangle formation and other formations. it was very bright it was red then orange than yellow and they were making different shapes and the took of into space. i felt very surprised and amazed. it went into space.
content.summary: I was on a boat with my friends it was midnight we were just hanging out and talking and i saw 3 reddish glowing object hovering moving around in various directions then took off into space.

content.detailedDescription: Backyard, laying on lawn chair listening to wind in the trees, watching shadows race across the moon, lights appeared out of nowhere, bright almost lumescent. object moved back and forth over mile radius in literally 2 seconds flat, then descended instantly, out of sight, reappeared 3 seconds later, then ascended straight up into sky and was gone. so fast.
content.summary: Glowing lights appeared out of nowhere

content.detailedDescription:
The object was very high in the sky, above 10,000 ft. 
it was a bright glowing circular object with a dark gap in the circle.  it flew towards us at a low rate of speed and was rotating. the dark section was moving with the speed of the rotation. 
the object flew from the horizon to a point above us and hovered, then it gained speed in the rotation until the dark gap was no longer visible due to the speed of the rotation. it reversed direction and flew off in the same direction from where it came. 
it took about 30 seconds to fly towards us and hover, and it took less than a half of a second to fly back over the horizon from where it originated.
content.summary: Circular light flew towards then back away from origin
